alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 7:20PM EST until January 04 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...From this evening to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. Water begins inundating Wolverine Road just north of the Hays Depot bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 23.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.1 feet by early Sunday afternoon. - Action stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 7 AM Sunday.
